tags.name: elmsln-loading
tags.description:
`elmsln-loading`
A spinner to tell the user that something is loading.
This is just the spinner though and doesn't provide any text or anything else.

attributes.name: size
attributes.description: tiny, small, medium, large, epic sizing.

properties.name: size
properties.description: tiny, small, medium, large, epic sizing.
